channel.title: Need help getting a server base that will save!
channel.description: I need to find a server base ( testscape, pimpscape, or anything. ) that will let me save!!! All of the server bases i have downloaded so far are not saving my players games! so will you help me by finding me a server base that will save or tell me how to get it to save? thanks![br][size=1]Posted on: April 25, 2007, 04:19:43 PM[/size][hr]can anyone help me?

item.title: Need help getting a server base that will save!

item.description:

howz about trying the xlinescape source. To me that seems like a good source to use.
